main.name: Emelia Jarnot
main.bio: I am a fullstack developer based in Portland, OR. I have fallen in love with coding and feel at home in its logic. I especially love problem solving within JavaScript. Both finding and squashing bugs and using the JavaScript language to answer and solve puzzles are things I especially enjoy!
main.contactmessage: Here is where you should write your message to readers to have them get in contact with you.

resume.skillmessage: Main experience in front end development within HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React. I have some knowledge of backend REST APIs within Node.js, Express.js, and SQL. I also have a basic knowledge of working within Visual Studio Code, Github, and Postman

education.description: Spent time in an intensive, 9 week, course learning both the front end browser side of building websites, with HTML, CSS, JavaScript, and React; and in the backend building databases with SQL, and servers with Node and Express.

Studied sociology for 4 years at a small liberal arts college located in the Willamette Valley. Focused my thesis studies on postmodern theory and how it relates to our interactions and identities on social media.
